item.title: Which is the best language to learn coding?
item.description: What is coding or programming? It is interesting that though many people talk about coding/programming nowadays, very few actually delve into this very fundamental question.

item.title: Building a simple web application using Flask
item.description: What is Flask? Flask is a very popular “micro” web development framework built with Python.

item.title: Formatting numbers according to Indian Locale in Javascript and Python
item.description: I came across this problem while building an app recently and thought it might be interesting to share.

item.title: Cool project ideas for computer science - 2021
item.description: Hi everyone! Here are some nice project ideas for those of you who want to implement projects and showcase in your college especially for final year computer science students.
